full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 293-1 Filed 05/25/21 Page 183 of 349 including one called by the USAO to offer the NPA term sheet resolution—and a sixth meeting together with the State Attorney and the lead state prosecutor to discuss the state plea. Acosta attended only one pre-NPA meeting. After the NPA was signed and before Epstein entered his state guilty pleas, the subject supervisors and the defense team had one substantive meeting, one unscheduled meeting on a procedural matter, and a meeting with one defense attorney in preparation for a conference call; in addition, Acosta had the breakfast meeting with Lefkowitz.229 Date | USAO Participants | Defense Participants | Topic/Purpose Pre-NPA Feb. 1, 2007 | Lourie / Villafaña | Lefcourt / Sanchez | Defense presents investigation improprieties and federal jurisdiction issues Feb. 20, 2007 | Lourie / Villafaña | Lefcourt / Sanchez | Defense presents witness issues June 26, 2007 | Sloman / Menchel / Lourie / Villafaña | Dershowitz / Black / Lefcourt / Sanchez | Defense presents legal issues, investigation improprieties, and federal jurisdiction issues July 31, 2007 | Sloman / Menchel / Lourie / Villafaña | Black / Lefcourt / Sanchez | USAO presents NPA term sheet Sept. 7, 2007 | Acosta / Oosterbaan / Sloman / Villafaña / Villafaña's co-counsel | Starr / Lefkowitz / Sanchez | Defense presents counteroffer Sept. 12, 2007 | Lourie / Lourie successor / Villafaña | Lefkowitz/ Lefcourt / Goldberger | Joint meeting with Krischer / Belohlavek re state plea provision of NPA Post-NPA Oct. 12, 2007 | Acosta | Lefkowitz | Defense discussion of NPA terms and likely appeal to Department Nov. 21, 2007 (unscheduled) | Sloman (possibly Acosta) | Lefkowitz (possibly Dershowitz) | Defense discussion of victims' attorney representative procedure Dec. 14, 2007 | Acosta / Sloman / Villafaña / another senior AUSA | Starr / Weinberg / Dershowitz / Lefcourt | Defense presents federal jurisdiction issues, legal issues, and request for de novo review Jan. 7, 2008 | (1) Acosta / Sloman (2) Acosta / Sloman (conference call) | (1) Sanchez (2) Starr / Lefkowitz/ Sanchez | Defense presents USAO improprieties and “watered-down” resolution 229 In addition, all of the subjects took phone calls from various defense attorneys, and although numerous documentary records refer to such calls, there may have been others for which OPP located no record. 156 DOJ-OGR-00004480

text_blocks.content: including one called by the USAO to offer the NPA term sheet resolution—and a sixth meeting together with the State Attorney and the lead state prosecutor to discuss the state plea. Acosta attended only one pre-NPA meeting. After the NPA was signed and before Epstein entered his state guilty pleas, the subject supervisors and the defense team had one substantive meeting, one unscheduled meeting on a procedural matter, and a meeting with one defense attorney in preparation for a conference call; in addition, Acosta had the breakfast meeting with Lefkowitz.229
Date | USAO Participants | Defense Participants | Topic/Purpose
Feb. 1, 2007 | Lourie / Villafaña | Lefcourt / Sanchez | Defense presents investigation improprieties and federal jurisdiction issues
Feb. 20, 2007 | Lourie / Villafaña | Lefcourt / Sanchez | Defense presents witness issues
June 26, 2007 | Sloman / Menchel / Lourie / Villafaña | Dershowitz / Black / Lefcourt / Sanchez | Defense presents legal issues, investigation improprieties, and federal jurisdiction issues
July 31, 2007 | Sloman / Menchel / Lourie / Villafaña | Black / Lefcourt / Sanchez | USAO presents NPA term sheet
Sept. 7, 2007 | Acosta / Oosterbaan / Sloman / Villafaña / Villafaña's co-counsel | Starr / Lefkowitz / Sanchez | Defense presents counteroffer
Sept. 12, 2007 | Lourie / Lourie successor / Villafaña | Lefkowitz/ Lefcourt / Goldberger | Joint meeting with Krischer / Belohlavek re state plea provision of NPA
Oct. 12, 2007 | Acosta | Lefkowitz | Defense discussion of NPA terms and likely appeal to Department
Nov. 21, 2007 (unscheduled) | Sloman (possibly Acosta) | Lefkowitz (possibly Dershowitz) | Defense discussion of victims' attorney representative procedure

Dec. 14, 2007 | Acosta / Sloman / Villafaña / another senior AUSA | Starr / Weinberg / Dershowitz / Lefcourt | Defense presents federal jurisdiction issues, legal issues, and request for de novo review
Jan. 7, 2008 | (1) Acosta / Sloman (2) Acosta / Sloman (conference call) | (1) Sanchez (2) Starr / Lefkowitz/ Sanchez | Defense presents USAO improprieties and “watered-down” resolution

229 In addition, all of the subjects took phone calls from various defense attorneys, and although numerous documentary records refer to such calls, there may have been others for which OPP located no record.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the case of Jeffrey Epstein. It includes a table detailing meetings between USAO participants and defense participants, along with the topics discussed during these meetings. The document is well-formatted and legible, with clear headings and concise descriptions.
